data.actual_result: It doesn't fit correctly and when you change apps, the emoji tab closes
data.expected_result: It should fit correctly and shouldn't close the emoji tab after changing to the other app in split screen.
data.short_description: When using split screen, the emoji tab doesn't fit very well and disappear when you change between apps
data.steps_to_repro: - Split your screen with discord and other app - Now go to discord and open the emoji tab. It doesn't fit very well (first problem) - With the emoji tab open, change to the other app in the split screen - The emoji tab should close and you have to reopen it
